text: After looking around at them with anger, being grieved at the hardness of their hearts,They had no compassion, no agape; their only concern was to preserve their system, their position and authority. He says to the man, “Stretch out your hand!” So he stretched, and his hand was restored as healthy as the other!Perhaps 5% of the Greek manuscripts omit ‘as healthy as the other’, as in NIV, NASB, LB, TEV, etc.
